Well, then who are all these people???I sure don't know many of them, I  
r=
ecognize my mother's voice because she lived just about her whole life with=
 
me,  but I don't know very many people, they could be guides, but I only =
know 
one of  two of them by name, and so far they have not come through ye=
t, as 
far as I  know. No these got to be real people not some brain fart c=
oming 
out of our  heads, lol  I had a few cusses too, but I don't give the=
m 
attention, they  are probably from the lower planes, I know, it's good v=
alidation, 
but I don't  need any validating, because I know it's real.sf
 =


In a message dated 5/20/2009 10:28:55 A.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
april=
@... writes:

 
 


=EF=BB=BF  
I am starting to w=
onder if it isn't an  audible scrying method. I am sure 
you have all heard=
 of "scrying" - a  person gazes into a reflective surface 
and gets visions=
. These visions  messages are from the Self - messages from 
your subconsci=
ous.
 
Maybe listening to random noise can  be an audible way of scrying.
 =

ls, and no money to pay them.
